title: Facebook Posts Search (m.facebook)
description: Search m.facebook.com for posts matching a query, with optional date filters, cookies, and proxy.

query.title: Query
query.description: Keywords to search for Facebook posts (e.g., "new premises" OR "opening soon").

maxResults.title: Max results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of posts to collect (1â€“5000).

recent_posts.title: Only recent posts (last 30 days)
recent_posts.description: If enabled, only include posts from the last 30 days (ignored when start/end dates are set).

start_date.title: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
start_date.description: Include posts on or after this date (optional).

end_date.title: End date (YYYY-MM-DD)
end_date.description: Include posts on or before this date (optional).

proxy.title: Proxy configuration (recommended)
proxy.description: Apify Proxy or custom proxy configuration; passed to Actor.createProxyConfiguration().

cookies.title: Playwright cookies (optional)
cookies.description: Browser cookies to pre-authenticate on Facebook (array of cookie objects).

expires.description: Expiry as Unix time (seconds). Omit for a session cookie.

maxPoolSize.title: Max session pool size
maxPoolSize.description: Maximum number of sessions in the pool.

persistState.title: Persist session state
persistState.description: Whether to persist session state between runs.

retireOnBlocked.title: Retire session when blocked
retireOnBlocked.description: Retire session if a blocked page is detected.
